controller

Class MoveGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MoveGenerator

  • public class MoveGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the efficient way for finding legal moves. It searches only legal move styles for a given piece, and stops when the path along a file or diagonal is blocked. It relies on the RuleEngine class for selfCheck checking as well as king castling, but all other validation is done internally.
    Author:
    Matthew

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void findBishopMoves(java.util.ArrayList<Move> legalMoves, int row, int col)
      Moves along all 4 diagonals until the path becomes blocks, and returns an arraylist of all legal moves to unoccupied squares or square occupied by the enemy.
      void findBishopMovesAlongDiagonal(java.util.ArrayList<Move> legalMoves, int row, int col, int rowDirection, int colDirection)
      Moves along the diagonal designated by rowDirection and colDirection and checks the validity of moving to each square until the path is blocked.
      java.util.ArrayList<Move> findKingMoves(java.util.ArrayList<Move> legalMoves, int row, int col)
      Checks one square in each direction around the king and calls RuleEngine's logic for validating castling moves.
      void findKnightMoves_1Row2Col(java.util.ArrayList<Move> legalMoves, int row, int col, int rowDirection, int colDirection)
      Returns knight moves that are one row over and two columns over in the direction designated by rowDirection and colDirection.

      Returns knight moves that are two rows over and one column over in the direction designated by rowDirection and colDirection.

      Checks all 8 squares a knight can move to and returns a list of the ones that it can go to.

      Finds all moves for the color of the given parameter color

      • findRookMoves

        public void findRookMoves(java.util.ArrayList<Move> legalMoves,
                 int row,
                 int col)
        All rule checking is enforced by the way that potential moves are explored. I.e. no need to call isValidMoveStyle because this method will only look at squares in the same row or column as the start square. isNotSelfCheck is called within to ensure total move legality.
        Parameters:
        row -
        col -
